entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
